name: Shazam
description: A module for applying REDCap inputs into tabular or other custom layouts for surverys and data entry forms

versions.1.0.2: Bug fixes around survey shazam with labels
versions.1.1.0: Added support for widgets and multiple bug fixes
versions.1.1.1: Fixed bug reported by Mark on label option
versions.1.1.2: Fixed js saving bug and isDev bug
versions.1.1.3: Hide Shazam Setup for only design users
versions.1.1.4: Extensive bug fixing to make it more robust across questions types and survey/data entry
versions.1.1.5: Fixed issue with js passthru and ExternalModules prior to 8.4.3
versions.1.1.6: Fixed label issue with descriptive fields

system-settings.name:
Shazam System-Wide Log File: (optional)
Provide a valid file path and Shazam will output debug information to this file

project-settings.name:
This module is configured by a link on the sidebar called 'Shazam Setup'.
The acutal config is stored in a hidden shazam-config external module variable.

Display Data History & Field Comment Log/Data Resolution Workflow Icons
You can also enable these icons for just a particular input by adding the class shazam-icons to a particular input field.
